name: Goddesses of Centralhelm
description:
The Goddesses of the realm have been captured. It is up to you to free them from their captors!

Begin your journey as an Adventurer, learning a smidgen from multiple classes. Once you're reached level 20, choose from one of the five base classes: Warrior, Mage, Bard, Ranger, and Potato Knight. At level 40, choose from one of eight advanced classes: Fighter, Magic Gladiator, Dark Artist, Healing Artist, Minstrel, Muse, Marksman, and Rogue.
